resources.string: This option allows to activate or not the notifications for each schedule update. They will indicate how many courses have been added, deleted and edited. In any case you can find them in the \"News\" tab.
This is the link to you Celcat calendar configured for your group(s). Remember to add at least one group before copying the link.
Update has failed, please check your internet connection
An error has occured during data update, some places may be missing
Unable to download places, please check your internet connection
No description available for this place.
Building update has failed, some may be missing
Restauration points update has failed, some may be missing
Incomming building data are invalid, some may be missing
Incomming restauration points data are invalid, some may be missing
